posts.post_content:
Your opponent has five life left, a board full of blockers and a 5/5 [Darksteel Juggernaut](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Juggernaut). Your creatures have all died trying to keep it from taking your last two life. On your turn, you drop a [Goblin Piker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Piker) and your opponent laughs in your face.  
  
Tap four. Your opponent's Juggernaut is now dead. Then your opponent.

posts.post_content: Very awesome card. Not only can it kill a creature, but it slaps the opponent in the face too. Also, note to goblinrunner09, [Mad Auntie](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mad Auntie) can't regenerate a creature you sacrifice. Regenerate only works on creatures that would be destroyed by damage or spells.

Removal in a gobbo deck:  
This

Consider Goblin War-strike as well.

posts.post_content:
Not a great card, due to the cost (4 mana plus a creature is really a lot).  
  
However, as long as [Phyrexian Obliterator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Obliterator), [Abyssal Persecutor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Abyssal Persecutor) and similar are around, it's [another](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=153126) reason to splash black in a goblin deck.  
  
In general, try [Dismember](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dismember)!
posts.html:
Not a great card, due to the cost (4 mana plus a creature is really a lot).

However, as long as Phyrexian Obliterator, Abyssal Persecutor and similar are around, it's another reason to splash black in a goblin deck.

In general, try Dismember!
